data.title: Dean's List
data.meta_description: College of Sciences undergraduate students Dean's List
data.text:
Congratulations!

Please join us in celebrating the academic excellence of our students in the College of Sciences! The college honors both Dean's List and Perfect Scholar recipients.

Dean's Perfect Scholars

The Dean’s Perfect Scholar designation is a unique recognition in the College of Sciences and recognizes students students who have a perfect 4.0 GPA for the term and meet all the other requirements that are posted for the Dean’s List.

Dean's List

The Dean's List is announced at the end of each term. Any undergraduate student taking 12 or more hours of degree credit for grade point credit who attains a grade point average of 3.40 or higher with no grade below C (2.00) is placed on the Dean's list. The student must also receive a passing grade on any nondegree credit courses in which he or she is enrolled. Students who receive grades of "Incomplete" are not placed on the Dean's List.
